text.author: Techtonica
text.title: Welcome to the Techtonica curriculum!
text.summary: This curriculum for Techtonica, a non-profit project offering hands on tech training, details a 15 week syllabus covering developer tools, webpages (HTML, CSS), JavaScript at React, Web APIs, databases, testing, data structures and algorithms, an Eventonica project and full stack practice, as well as a career week and assessments.
